newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Offshore buying lifts CRA and WMC.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Offshore buying lifts CRA and WMC.

text.p: Shares in major mining houses CRA Ltd and WMC Ltd strongly outperformed the overall Australian market on Friday, going ahead on the back of plentiful offshore buying for the resource leaders.
By 1.10 p.m. (0310 GMT), CRA shares were 24 cents or 1.24 percent higher at A$19.64 while WMC shares were 15 cents or 1.7 percent higher at A$8.96.

"Overseas buying normally centres on a few heavyweight stocks and any buying in the resources will always spill over to CRA and WMC," said Andrew Sekely, head of equities at brokerage house Intersuisse.

By 1.25 p.m. (0325 GMT), CRA shares were remained 24 cents up at A$19.64 on turnover of 557,214 shares while WMC shares had eased slightly to be 14 cents up at A$8.95 on turnover of 3.25 million shares.
